io.wcm.qa.glnm.reporting

Class GaleniumReportUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.qa.glnm.reporting.GaleniumReportUtil

  • public final class GaleniumReportUtil
extends Object
    Utility class containing methods handling reporting.

    1.0.0
